name: SecondDimension
comment: That was fun, especially when you get a rabbit. Very addictive game, I died a lot but kept coming back for more.

name: OnlySlightly
comment: The animation and music was awesome! Really great aesthetic overall but I've come to expect that from you guys ;) Overall game feel was great to. It was really satisfying smashing down on those rabbits. (p.s. I loved that they were on treadmills)
